item.title: Jekyll to Wordpress to Hugo
item.description: Why I ditched Jekyll and Wordpress When I first created my personal blog about 3 years ago, I chose to use Jekyll hosted on Github Pages. At the time, I was not confident enough to modify my Jekyll theme to fit into my needs, and I decided to move to dockerized Wordpress hosted on my own AWS EC2 server. Wordpress was easy to use due to the out-of-box web interface for blog administration.
